MajorClaims.Text: working at home is worse and less efficient than working in the office
working in the office is obviously better than working at home in terms of efficiency

Claims.Text: while working in the office, people can interact with their colleges instantly
working at home has many disadvantages that will no doubt lower the efficiency of works

Premises.Text: Think about the big project that a group is working on, if any group member has new idea about the project, he/she can assemble his/her colleges right away and discuss
They can either get help from colleges or discuss about the work together
It's more efficient and straight-forward than talking in the phone
if one’s computer or Internet has any breakdown, he/she can call the MIS staff to fix
